column1: Little Goat Diner////Good with a couple comments.  Food is unique and tasted great.  Coffee tasted great.  Having said that if you are not into unique ways of having a breakfast dish
column3: waffles - but with peanut butter butter and bacon bits.  But they make it work because it tasted good.  Lastly
column5: it was hard to hear people at the other end of our table.
